mil3.1.12:1.3: “Upatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ, mahārāja, vīriyaṃ, vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti.
mil3.1.12:2.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, puriso gehe patante aññena dārunā upatthambheyya, upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na pateyya;
mil3.1.12:2.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, upatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ, vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti.
mil3.1.12:3.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, parittakaṃ senaṃ mahatī senā bhañjeyya, tato rājā aññamaññaṃ anussāreyya anupeseyya attano parittakāya senāya balaṃ anupadaṃ dadeyya, tāya saddhiṃ parittakā senā mahatiṃ senaṃ bhañjeyya;
mil3.1.12:3.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, upatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ, vīriyūpatthambhitā sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyanti.
mil3.1.12:3.5: ‘vīriyavā kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti.
